title: Media Buyer (Facebook/Google/TikTok)
job_overview:
Media Buyer (Facebook/Google/TikTok)
We are seeking an experienced Media Buyer to manage budgets and deliver profitable campaigns across major ad platforms.

Requirements:

At least 2 years in media buying

Expertise in Meta, Google, and TikTok ad ecosystems

Strong focus on ROI, targeting, and optimization

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
